com.brightcove.player.view

Interface RenderView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BrightcoveClosedCaptioningSurfaceView, BrightcoveSurfaceView, BrightcoveTextureView, SeamlessSurfaceView

    public interface RenderView
    A common interface implemented by BrightcoveSurfaceView and BrightcoveTextureView.
